location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a copy of a translation of a letter, dated 8 September 1814, from Shaik Hassan ben Rahma [Shaikh Hasan bin Rahma] the Joassemee [Āl Qāsimī] Chief, to William Bruce, in which the Shaikh denies having captured any boats with British passes or colours. Bruce states his intentions to travel to Ras el Khima [Ra's al-Khaymah], in order both to renew a treaty and to recover any property that he may be able to prove as belonging to the English.
